## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

- Java 11 or higher
- Gradle 7.0 or higher
- Git
- Your favorite IDE

### Installation

1. Clone the repository

```sh
$ git clone <repository-url>
```
2. Build the project

```sh
$ gradle build
```

3. Run the project

```sh
$ gradle run
```
